data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in Nashville.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Columbus.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 6, Pedro Santos (Columbus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus drives forward and Gyasi Zardes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Daniel Lovitz of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 9, Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Columbus.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Nashville.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
Columbus's Pedro Santos breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Armando Villarreal awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Alex Muyl (Nashville) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 24, Jhonder Cadiz (Nashville) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In Columbus, Hany Mukhtar of Nashville is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 27, Nashville's Jhonder Cadiz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Columbus defender.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Nashville's Walker Zimmerman goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 29, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
In the minute 32, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Nashville drive upfield and Hany Mukhtar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Columbus defender.
Armando Villarreal signals a Columbus throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 35, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus.
At Mapfre Stadium, Columbus are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 36, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Nashville.
In the minute 38, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 42, Alistair Johnston (Nashville) has received a first yellow card.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Nashville defence as Luis Diaz fires in a strike for Columbus.
Luis Diaz for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
In the minute 45, Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half has come to a close in Columbus.
The second half has started at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Armando Villarreal signals a Nashville throw-in in Columbus's half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 49, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 55, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Columbus.
Nashville surge into the attack at Mapfre Stadium but Walker Zimmermanâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Nashville.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 64, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
Columbus are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 66, Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nashville are pushing forward but Alex Muyl's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 71, Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
Free kick in a good position for Columbus!
In Columbus Columbus attack through Lucas Zelarrayan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Columbus to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
The away team have replaced Brian Anunga with Derrick Jones. This is the first substitution made today by Gary Smith.
In the minute 75, Walker Zimmerman (Nashville) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Columbus defenders.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Columbus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Columbus drive upfield and Lucas Zelarrayan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nashville defender.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Columbus, close to Nashville's area.
In the minute 80, Armando Villarreal signals a Columbus throw-in in Nashville's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 82, Gyasi Zardes's header is off-target for Columbus.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Armando Villarreal awards Columbus a goal kick.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville's Jhonder Cadiz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
It's 0-0 at the end of normal time.
The first extra period is just kicking-off.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
Columbus push forward at Mapfre Stadium and Artur gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nashville defence.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Columbus are coming forward and Lucas Zelarrayan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Columbus take a 1-0 lead thanks to Pedro Santos.
Gyasi Zardes with an assist there.
The away team replace Jhonder Cadiz with Daniel Rios.
Gary Smith is making the team's third substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Taylor Washington replacing Randall Leal.
Nashville push upfield and Alex Muyl gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Columbus defence.
It's now 2-0 in Columbus as Gyasi Zardes scores for Columbus.
Great play from Luis Diaz to set up the goal.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st extra.
Free kick Nashville.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Columbus.
Eric Miller is replacing Alistair Johnston for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
Nashville make their fifth substitution with Handwalla Bwana replacing Alex Muyl.
Free kick Columbus.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a first substitution, with Emmanuel Boateng replacing Luis Diaz.
Columbus to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Nashville will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Columbus.
Throw-in Nashville.
Taylor Washington is booked for the away team.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Caleb Porter is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Krisztian Nemeth replacing Gyasi Zardes.
Throw-in for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
Nashville attack but Walker Zimmerman's header doesn't find the target.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Chris Cadden is on a sub for Lucas Zelarrayan for Columbus.
Columbus needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Columbus's half?
Throw-in for Nashville close to the penalty box.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Emmanuel Boateng gets his shot on target but fails to score for Columbus.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Armando Villarreal awards Columbus a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd extra.
Columbus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Extra-time is over. The score is 2-0.
